opportunities.title: Leadership Transition Support
opportunities.description: Lisa Bolger is planning to transition out of her role by early next year and has requested AC to lead the search for her replacement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Lisa is planning to transition out of her role by March-April-May next year to pursue coaching, and she specifically requested that AC lead the search for her replacement.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Prepare a tailored plan for the leadership transition search to ensure a smooth process and maintain the strong relationship.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with US Team
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to improve the US team's listening and communication skills to better align with PartnerRe's needs.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Need for more listening on US side compared to European side, sometimes tendency to 'over talk' rather than listen.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Conduct training sessions for the US team to enhance listening skills and cultural understanding to strengthen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Re-engage on Multi-Stakeholder Searches
opportunities.description: Challenges in coordinating searches with multiple stakeholders indicate a need for improved processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Challenges managing searches with multiple stakeholders across US and Europe, especially when hiring manager is different from engagement lead.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and implement a robust process for managing multi-stakeholder searches to ensure smoother coordination.

opportunities.title: Enhance Timeline and Logistics Management
opportunities.description: There have been some delays and coordination issues, particularly with last-minute scheduling requests.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some delays and coordination issues, especially with last-minute scheduling requests.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Improve scheduling and logistics processes to better handle last-minute changes and ensure timely execution.

opportunities.title: Balance Candidate Presentation
opportunities.description: There is a need to maintain a balance between presenting good candidates and ensuring an authentic fit to avoid the perception of overselling.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Need to maintain balance between presenting good candidates and ensuring authentic fit, avoiding perception of overselling.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Train the team on the importance of authentic fit over selling to maintain credibility and trust.

opportunities.title: Structured Follow-Up with Placed Candidates
opportunities.description: Vanessa expressed a desire for follow-up calls with the placed candidate, Anne, at key milestones to gather feedback and ensure successful integration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Vanessa hopes for follow-up calls at a few weeks, 3 months, and 6 months to get candid feedback.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a structured follow-up process with placed candidates at key milestones to gather feedback and ensure successful integration.

opportunities.title: Timely Delivery of Candidate Reports
opportunities.description: Initial candidate reports were sent too close to the interview dates, limiting preparation time for Vanessa.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Initial candidate reports were sent only 48 hours before interviews - too short notice for thorough preparation.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a standard practice of sending candidate reports 3-4 business days before interviews to allow proper preparation time.

opportunities.title: Fee Structure Flexibility for Non-Exco Positions
opportunities.description: Vanessa indicated that the high fees limit the use of CompanyA's services to Exco level positions only.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Fees are higher than other headhunters in Belgium - limiting use to Exco level positions only.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Consider offering a more flexible fee structure for non-Exco positions to expand market opportunities in Belgium.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Confidentiality and Trust in Small Markets
opportunities.description: Confidentiality and trust were key reasons for selecting CompanyA, especially in Belgium's small market.
opportunities.supportingQuote: CompanyA's approach to confidentiality was exceptional - critical in Belgium's small market.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue emphasizing confidentiality and trust in pitches for sensitive searches to reinforce client confidence.

opportunities.title: Succession Planning Evaluation Services
opportunities.description: TriSummit Utilities has gaps in their succession planning, with a matrix that lacks real assessment of capability. There is an opportunity for CompanyA to provide evaluation services to address these gaps.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Succession planning gaps - the company's succession matrix had names but no real assessment of capability, creating blind spots that the assessment process revealed.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and offer comprehensive succession planning evaluation services to help companies assess and address capability gaps.

opportunities.title: Board-Level Coaching and Development
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to provide board-level coaching and development services, which are in demand for third-party validation and shareholder confidence.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Board-level coaching and development - opportunity identified for third-party assistance in board-level coaching, especially given shareholder need for external validation.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Create and market board-level coaching and development offerings to meet the demand for third-party validation.

opportunities.title: Meeting to Discuss Succession Planning Services
opportunities.description: Greg is planning to meet with ConsultantA to discuss succession planning services, indicating a strong potential for expanded engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg is planning to meet with ConsultantA to discuss succession planning services, showing strong potential for expanded engagement.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Prepare for the upcoming meeting with Greg by developing a tailored proposal for succession planning services.

opportunities.title: Enhance Marketing and Brand Visibility
opportunities.description: CompanyA's marketing and visibility are limited, with Greg only aware of them through golf sponsorship. There is a need to improve brand awareness and visibility.
opportunities.supportingQuote: CompanyA's marketing and visibility - Greg only knew of them through golf sponsorship and wouldn't have heard of them otherwise; suggests need for better marketing/education.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Expand marketing efforts beyond golf sponsorship to include corporate governance education and thought leadership initiatives.

opportunities.title: Develop Educational Content Formats
opportunities.description: There is a need for more educational content in formats that are accessible and engaging for senior executives, such as one-pagers and conversations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Education and thought leadership - opportunity to provide more educational content (one-pagers, conversations) rather than long papers, especially for older executives.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Create concise educational materials and opportunities for dialogue to engage senior executives effectively.

opportunities.title: Need for Compensation Expertise
opportunities.description: Jeanette highlighted the need for detailed understanding and benchmarking of compensation structures to avoid delays and confusion.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Compensation information was extremely difficult to obtain... requiring constant back-and-forth.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Train consultants on compensation structures and develop better benchmarking capabilities to gather and present compensation information early in the process.

opportunities.title: Diversity in Consultant Teams
opportunities.description: The lack of female consultants was seen as a barrier to attracting diverse candidate slates, indicating a need for more diverse consultant teams.
opportunities.supportingQuote: All-male consultant team... making it harder to attract female candidates.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Recruit and deploy more female consultants, especially for roles requiring diverse candidate slates.

opportunities.title: Follow-up and Relationship Repair
opportunities.description: Jeanette is open to future engagements if improvements are made, indicating an opportunity to repair and strengthen the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Jeanette is open to future engagements if improvements are made.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue outreach efforts, like Stuart's follow-up meeting, and use feedback to improve future engagements.

opportunities.title: Enhance Project Management and Communication
opportunities.description: Inefficient communication and late reports were major pain points, suggesting a need for better project management practices.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Reports arrived too late... making preparation impossible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Send reports well in advance of calls (at least 2-3 business days) and proactively manage timelines and communication.

opportunities.title: Increase Assertiveness and Pace
opportunities.description: The consultants' lack of assertiveness and slow pace did not meet the client's high-energy expectations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Lack of pace and urgency... didn't match the CEO's high-energy, fast-moving style.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Match high-energy client expectations by proactively recommending top candidates and driving conversations.

opportunities.title: Proactive Brief Alignment
opportunities.description: The consultants did not proactively identify when candidates weren't matching the brief, requiring client intervention.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Didn't proactively identify when candidates weren't matching brief.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Regularly check in on brief alignment and proactively identify when candidates don't match requirements.

opportunities.title: Potential for Broader Consultancy Roles
opportunities.description: The board chair expressed openness to using Korn Ferry for broader consultancy roles beyond executive search.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The board chair is open to using Korn Ferry for broader consultancy roles.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should explore and propose additional consultancy services that could benefit the museum.

opportunities.title: Leverage KF4 Assessment Tool
opportunities.description: The successful use of the KF4 assessment tool in the CEO search could be expanded to other roles within the museum.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry's KF4 assessment tool was used for both candidates and the museum director.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should offer to implement the KF4 assessment tool for other key positions at the museum.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Partnership with Regular Check-ins
opportunities.description: Regular communication was appreciated during the search process, indicating the value of ongoing engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Communication was regular, and the experience was smooth.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should schedule regular check-ins with the museum to maintain and strengthen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Understanding of Matrix Roles
opportunities.description: Greg highlighted a lack of understanding of the matrix COO role, which affected candidate alignment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think they struggled to understand what the matrix nature of the organization of the business was, what the role was.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Invest in training consultants to better understand complex and matrix-style roles to improve candidate alignment.

opportunities.title: Proactive Market Engagement
opportunities.description: Competitors offer proactive updates and market insights, which Korn Ferry could emulate to deepen client relationships.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Hunter Healthcare offers strong market knowledge, proactive updates, and value-add connections.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a strategy to provide regular market insights and proactive engagement to clients.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust and Value Perception
opportunities.description: The client expressed a lack of trust and value, indicating they would not use Korn Ferry again.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Would you use them again? – No and to be honest, we have a senior role now, but I've gone somewhere else.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate a follow-up meeting to address concerns, demonstrate commitment, and outline improvements in service delivery.

opportunities.title: Align on Candidate Quality Expectations
opportunities.description: There was a mismatch in candidate quality expectations, leading to dissatisfaction with the shortlist.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some of the people on the shortlist had minimal experience... after five minutes, you knew they just were nowhere near what you wanted.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a process to ensure early alignment on candidate quality expectations and adjust shortlists accordingly.

opportunities.title: Provide Clearer Compensation Guidance
opportunities.description: The client felt there was weak guidance on compensation and package negotiations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: When it came to saying, right, perhaps our candidate, let's negotiate. What does she expect? And the answer was, I don't know.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Enhance consultant training on compensation trends and negotiation strategies to provide clearer guidance to clients.

opportunities.title: Flexible Client Engagement
opportunities.description: Engagement was often based on consultant availability rather than client needs, leading to a one-sided dynamic.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We did both [have] fairly regular contact, although it was frequently based on when Thomas was available, maybe not when we were available.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Adopt a more client-centric approach to scheduling and communication to ensure alignment with client availability.

opportunities.title: Need for Candidates with Asian Market Experience
opportunities.description: Harry expressed a desire for candidates with more experience in the Asian market, acknowledging the challenge due to the market's youth.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would have liked to see someone with a lot more Asian experience... but I also have to be fair to Korn Ferry — not necessarily a lot of those people exist, right?
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should expand its network and database to include more candidates with Asian market experience to better meet future client needs.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Recruitment Services for Small Companies
opportunities.description: Harry values Korn Ferry's recruitment services for senior-level positions but is cautious about broader consultancy costs due to budget constraints.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm a small company...and they are, of course, costly, right?... something like, you know, recruitment in that sort of level, absolutely, you know, that's where I think the dollars are very well spent.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should consider offering tailored recruitment packages for small companies to enhance value perception and deepen relationships.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Trust and Long-Term Relationship
opportunities.description: Harry has a long-standing relationship with Korn Ferry and trusts them to deliver, indicating a strong foundation for continued collaboration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've been dealing with Korn Ferry literally... I mean, they've now placed me, I think, in two jobs... so I've known them for probably two, close to two decades...maybe even three decades.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should maintain consistent communication and engagement with Harry to reinforce the existing trust and long-term relationship.

opportunities.title: Address Cost Sensitivity for Consultancy Services
opportunities.description: Harry perceives consultancy work as expensive for his small company, suggesting a need for cost-effective solutions.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I can only spend $1 once, and I don't have that many dollars, right? So...would they come to me top of the list for an organizational development? No, I don't think I would put them on top of the list.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should explore offering more cost-effective consultancy options or flexible pricing models for small companies.

opportunities.title: Potential Role of AI in Logistics
opportunities.description: Tony mentioned that AI could play a role in logistics or market reach in the future, indicating a potential area for Korn Ferry to explore.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Tony noted that while AI could play a role in logistics or market reach in the future, today the value of Korn Ferry lies in its people-first approach.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore AI solutions that could enhance logistical efficiency and market reach in executive searches.

opportunities.title: Enhance Compensation Benchmarking Support
opportunities.description: While compensation benchmarking is handled internally, Korn Ferry could provide additional data points to inform Carilion's analysis.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If Korn Ferry had that information, it could help inform us as a data point, but it would not be the benchmark we would use in our final analysis.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer to provide comprehensive compensation data as a supplementary resource for Carilion's internal benchmarking processes.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Human Touch in Client Interactions
opportunities.description: Tony values the human touch and relationship with Korn Ferry, suggesting that maintaining this focus is crucial for continued success.
opportunities.supportingQuote: For me…the human touch, the relationship is the key ingredient to a successful recruitment.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to prioritize personal interactions and relationship-building in client engagements to maintain trust and satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Position Assessment Tools as Complementary
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's assessment tools are valued but should be positioned as complementary to Carilion's internal processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think Korn Ferry's tool is good, it's helpful, and again it's just one additional data point for us as we think through how we assess our candidates.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Emphasize the complementary nature of Korn Ferry's assessment tools in client communications to reinforce their value alongside internal tools.

opportunities.title: Enhance Initial Communication Cadence
opportunities.description: There was a misalignment in communication style and cadence at the outset, leading to frustration due to delays and reliance on calls instead of quick email responses.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We are a time sensitive organization...we're hearing back within two three hours. Sometimes it would be overnight, sometimes it would be a little bit longer.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Set clear communication expectations upfront, including SLAs, preferred channels, and response times to avoid misalignment.

opportunities.title: Maintain Candidate Pipeline Until Hire
opportunities.description: There was a concern about the lack of a backup candidate pool, which could have been problematic if the finalist did not work out.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I was not quite comfortable that we had a ready backup pool we'd be able to immediately bring in and continue the process.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Sustain a flow of candidates until an offer is fully secured to ensure contingency planning is in place.

opportunities.title: Proactive Assessment Result Notifications
opportunities.description: The lack of proactive alerts for assessment results led to delays, as the client was unaware when results were sent.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There hadn't been a communication from the team beyond sending it to a dedicated mailbox...that sort of proactive nudge that says, Hey...This is where things are standing. That was missing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Embed proactive assessment notifications as a standard practice to alert clients when outputs are sent.

opportunities.title: Rehire Potential with Communication Refinements
opportunities.description: Andre confirmed they would rehire Korn Ferry if improvements around communication expectations are made.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If we had search to do over again, I would rehire them, as long as we did some early setting of communication preferences, timeliness of responses, that sort of thing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure communication preferences and timeliness are clearly established in future engagements to strengthen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Need for Association-Specific Expertise
opportunities.description: The client highlighted a need for consultants who understand the unique operational and governance model of associations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The consultant struggled to fully grasp the unique operational and governance model of associations.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Deploy consultants with specific experience in member-driven governance models for future association engagements.

opportunities.title: Deepen Understanding of Client's Governance
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to expand the relationship by better aligning with the client's governance structure and decision-making processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The consultant sometimes went directly to the Board Chair, overriding the recruitment policy.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure all team members are briefed on and adhere to the client's governance and decision-making processes from the start.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust with Improved Responsiveness
opportunities.description: The client expressed hesitance to re-engage due to past communication issues, indicating a need to rebuild trust.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Feedback sometimes required repeating before being actioned.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a system to ensure client feedback is promptly acknowledged and acted upon to rebuild trust.

opportunities.title: Align Candidate Recommendations with Client Criteria
opportunities.description: Improving the alignment of candidate recommendations with the client's criteria would enhance service quality.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some recommendations did not reflect the client's clear criteria or feedback.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a more rigorous process for aligning candidate recommendations with client criteria and feedback.

opportunities.title: Strategic Focus Over Volume in Candidate Search
opportunities.description: The client preferred a small pool of high-quality candidates rather than a broad outreach.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The client wanted a small pool of high-quality candidates to benchmark against a strong internal candidate.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Focus on strategic, quality-driven candidate searches rather than volume-driven approaches.

opportunities.title: Clarify Assessment Approach Early
opportunities.description: Michael emphasized the need for a proactive discussion about assessment processes to avoid overlap with Cargill's own intensive process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: My only recommendation is make sure you have a very clear conversation with your client about your assessment, whether they have one, and whether it makes sense to do both. Yeah, upfront.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate early discussions with clients to align on assessment processes and avoid duplication.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate Pipeline Continuity
opportunities.description: At one stage, the search felt too dependent on a single finalist, creating concern about having options for stakeholders.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There was some stress at one point that, like, man, are we putting all our eggs in one basket... at the 11th hour, Korn Ferry pulled a rabbit out of their hat with the candidate that ultimately got this job.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure a robust and continuous candidate pipeline to provide multiple options throughout the search process.

opportunities.title: Leverage Strong Outcomes for Deeper Engagement
opportunities.description: A client-led five-year audit confirmed Korn Ferry's stronger outcomes across hires, retention, and diversity compared to competitors.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I did a five-year audit... the data, no matter what way you cut it, their performance is the best compared to the three that we work with regularly.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Use audit results to propose expanded partnerships and additional services to Cargill.

opportunities.title: Need for Quicker Interim Updates
opportunities.description: Dr. Nina expressed a desire for quicker interim updates to reassure stakeholders and provide feedback earlier in the process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It would have been better to just get...the first profile to work with...and tell them [yes] that's going in the right direction.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a process for sharing initial candidate profiles earlier in the search process to allow for timely feedback and adjustments.

opportunities.title: Potential for Future Engagement
opportunities.description: Dr. Nina confirmed they would use Korn Ferry again, indicating a positive outlook for future engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Yes, absolutely [would use them again]...I'm really happy with the result.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain regular contact with Dr. Nina to explore upcoming opportunities and reinforce the positive relationship.

opportunities.title: Address Initial Perception of Disengagement
opportunities.description: The CFO had initial reservations about Korn Ferry's responsiveness and engagement, which could affect future collaborations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: In the very beginning [the CFO] really had the impression they [Korn Ferry] didn't want to do the job.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage with the CFO to address past concerns and demonstrate commitment to improving responsiveness and engagement.

opportunities.title: Enhance Flexibility in Processes
opportunities.description: Dr. Nina felt that Korn Ferry's structured methodology sometimes lacked the flexibility seen in boutique firms.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Sometimes I would have liked them to be a bit more...flexible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce more adaptable processes that allow for client-specific adjustments while maintaining quality standards.

opportunities.title: Improve Data Handling Practices
opportunities.description: Dr. Nina preferred a more secure method of sharing profiles, such as a shared drive, rather than email.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'd rather you share your drive, you can put them there, and once the search is finished, I'm going to close the drive.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Adopt modern, secure methods for sharing candidate profiles, aligning with client preferences for data handling.

opportunities.title: Enhance Response Times
opportunities.description: Emails sometimes went unanswered for extended periods, leading to frustration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Sometimes it took 30 hours or so but you have an email to three [people] so you would have thought at least one of them could just tell me.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish clear response time expectations and ensure timely communication to improve client satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Advisory on AI and Workforce Evolution
opportunities.description: Stephen expressed interest in understanding AI's impact on workforce development and compensation structures, indicating a need for advisory services in this area.
opportunities.supportingQuote: AI awareness is something always on my mind… it’s confusing, but it’s changing how younger generations develop within the workforce.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate discussions with Stephen on how Korn Ferry can provide insights and strategies related to AI's impact on talent and compensation.

opportunities.title: Broader Engagement as DLH Grows
opportunities.description: Stephen is open to using Korn Ferry more broadly as DLH Holdings expands, suggesting potential for increased engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would consider using them more broadly as DLH Holdings grows.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore additional services that could support DLH Holdings' growth and present these options to Stephen.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Quality Assurance Processes
opportunities.description: Occasional errors in presentation materials have slightly undermined confidence, indicating a need to reinforce quality assurance.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I always trust their work. But...there are times where I have found mistakes...which I'm kind of surprised about.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement additional quality control checks to ensure accuracy in deliverables and maintain client trust.

opportunities.title: Enhance Accuracy in Deliverables
opportunities.description: Stephen noted occasional quality-control errors in presentation materials, which could be improved to enhance service quality.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Occasional calculation/formula errors in presentations slightly undermined confidence.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Review and refine the process for creating and reviewing presentation materials to minimize errors.

opportunities.title: Post-Placement Follow-Up
opportunities.description: Vanessa expressed interest in Korn Ferry conducting follow-ups with placed candidates to gather feedback and reinforce the partnership.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I really hope that they will do a follow up with [our placement]...when she's [been] here for a few weeks and then maybe within three or six months....Give her a call and really ask like how is it going and then give me the feedback because that's really valuable for me
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a structured post-placement follow-up process to gather feedback from both clients and candidates.

opportunities.title: Timely Report Delivery
opportunities.description: Initial feedback highlighted the need for more lead time before interviews; Korn Ferry adapted swiftly following clarification.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They sent the first candidate report...48 hours before the interview...I told them that this was too short
opportunities.suggestedAction: Standardize report delivery timelines to ensure clients have sufficient preparation time before interviews.

opportunities.title: Consistency in Candidate Reports
opportunities.description: Early reports had minor omissions which were quickly addressed, indicating a need for consistent report quality.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There was also some information missing... but they were very reactive and adapted it for the next reports.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure consistent quality and completeness in candidate reports to maintain client confidence.

opportunities.title: Extend Candidate Lifecycle Engagement
opportunities.description: Vanessa values ongoing engagement and feedback post-placement, which could deepen the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I really hope that they will do a follow up with [our placement]...when she's [been] here for a few weeks and then maybe within three or six months.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce a consistent post-placement follow-up to gather feedback and reinforce relationship depth.

opportunities.title: Leverage Broader Expertise and Data
opportunities.description: Lisa has utilized Korn Ferry's data and expertise for leader profiles and benchmarking, indicating a need for continued access to such resources.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm like I actually need something in this area, have you got something that would help, while it's not everyday...there's been a sharing of all the resources that are available to us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer regular updates and insights from Korn Ferry's data resources to support PartnerRe's strategic needs.

opportunities.title: Enhance Cross-Team Coordination
opportunities.description: Lisa noted the need for improved coordination and communication when multiple teams are involved, suggesting an opportunity to deepen the relationship by addressing these logistical challenges.
opportunities.supportingQuote: [There's] an opportunity to work on communication when there are multiple teams around the table.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a streamlined communication protocol for multi-team engagements to ensure seamless coordination.

opportunities.title: Improve Listening in US-Led Searches
opportunities.description: There is a need for deeper listening and local sensitivity in US-based searches to strengthen the partnership.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There's probably a little bit more listening needed on the US side than the European side... sometimes to prove you want to do a great job, you can over-talk.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Conduct training sessions focused on enhancing listening skills and cultural sensitivity for US-based teams.

opportunities.title: Refine Scheduling Processes
opportunities.description: Minor scheduling issues have arisen, particularly with last-minute meeting arrangements, indicating a need for process improvement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I know there's been some [difficulty] trying to get meetings in the diary with CFF, or interviews in the diary with the CFF last minute, which is never going to work for her.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish clear scheduling protocols and advance notice requirements to prevent last-minute conflicts.

opportunities.title: Ensure Consistency Across Teams
opportunities.description: There is a need to ensure consistent quality of delivery across different project teams, as experiences have varied when other consultants led searches.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I wasn't as impressed...we had a talent search...the person that was on it was fine but then he ended up leaving so wasn't as engaged...Jerry took over and we were able to move the process along pretty quickly...it depends on the team that you're working with.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement standardized processes and training to ensure all teams deliver the same high-quality service as Jerry's team.

opportunities.title: Share Market Insights and Compensation Benchmarking
opportunities.description: Cana expressed interest in receiving periodic benchmarking or compensation insights, which could deepen the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If we could get more comp benchmarking surveys. I know that when we used to work... with Heidrick & Struggles, they would send us an annual comp report which was helpful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and offer periodic market insights and compensation benchmarking reports to Macquarie.

opportunities.title: Support in Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Initiatives
opportunities.description: Macquarie is focused on increasing diverse representation in senior hiring, presenting an opportunity for Korn Ferry to support these initiatives.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Key HR priorities include: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion: increasing diverse representation in senior hiring.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Propose tailored search strategies and candidate pipelines that emphasize diversity and inclusion.

opportunities.title: Assist with Digital and AI Integration
opportunities.description: Macquarie is looking to expand its technological capability and data-led decision-making, indicating a potential need for Korn Ferry's support in these areas.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Digital and AI integration: expanding technological capability and data-led decision-making across the business.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore opportunities to provide expertise or partnerships that enhance Macquarie's digital and AI capabilities.

opportunities.title: Talent Development for New Growth Areas
opportunities.description: Macquarie is focusing on talent development for new growth areas such as private equity adjacencies and entrepreneurial fund structures.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Talent development for new growth areas: including private equity adjacencies and entrepreneurial fund structures.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer strategic advice and talent solutions to support Macquarie's growth in these new areas.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Assessment Services
opportunities.description: Mike expressed a need for more insightful and actionable assessment outputs that align with client expectations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The assessment outputs were seen as less insightful and not fully aligned with expectations.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Review and enhance the assessment design to provide deeper insights and actionable information.

opportunities.title: Broaden Relationship Beyond Lead Consultant
opportunities.description: Mike's experience was largely shaped by Dan's personal approach, indicating an opportunity to expand the relationship to include more of Korn Ferry's team.

opportunities.supportingQuote: I've also created a grading tool by ourselves, because they don't provide one which is very useful or not too expensive.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore offering a practical, affordable grading tool to meet client needs.

opportunities.title: Address Functional vs Hierarchical Leadership
opportunities.description: Felix found it difficult to benchmark roles with functional versus hierarchical leadership, highlighting a methodological limitation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Many people have functional leadership roles in comparison with hierarchical... can be difficult.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide guidance or examples on how to handle functional versus hierarchical roles within the methodology.

opportunities.title: Maintain Strong Responsiveness and Relationship
opportunities.description: Felix appreciated the strong rapport and trust with the Korn Ferry team, which was a highly valued aspect of the experience.
opportunities.supportingQuote: With the colleagues of the team... I get very well... they are very responsive, and I don't have feelings that... you cannot trust them.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to prioritize responsiveness and relationship-building to strengthen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Onboarding Support for New CEO
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry has promised to support the onboarding of the new CEO, but this phase has not yet begun.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They have promised us that they will be there... but it hasn't really begun yet.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate the onboarding support process promptly to ensure a smooth transition for the new CEO.

opportunities.title: Single Point of Contact for Communication
opportunities.description: Early confusion was caused by communications from multiple Korn Ferry staff, making it difficult to track information.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Early on, it was a little confusing... several different people... reaching out... we couldn't search for [emails] easily.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a single, consistent communication point from the start of the project to streamline information flow.

opportunities.title: Leverage Institutional Knowledge for Future Projects
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's familiarity with the museum has strengthened the partnership, suggesting potential for expanded collaboration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They had helped us with salary surveys... market analyses... job description... we'd been working with them on and off for two or three years.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore additional areas where Korn Ferry's institutional knowledge could be leveraged for future projects with the museum.

opportunities.title: Maintain Tailored Approach in Future Engagements
opportunities.description: The interviewee valued Korn Ferry's tailored approach, contrasting with other firms that attempted to redefine the brief.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They had a better understanding of what we were looking for... [Korn Ferry] tailored the search to what we really wanted.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to prioritize a tailored approach in future engagements, ensuring alignment with the client's specific needs.

opportunities.title: Need for Gender-Diverse Candidate Slates
opportunities.description: Jeanette expressed a need for more gender-diverse candidate slates in future searches, as repeated reminders were required to include female candidates.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We had to remind the guys a number of times that we want to see women as well as men.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a transparent process to ensure gender-diverse candidate slates are presented from the outset.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with Assertive Leadership
opportunities.description: Jeanette expected stronger guidance and more confident facilitation from consultants, indicating an opportunity to deepen the relationship through assertive leadership.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It always felt very hesitant.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Train consultants to lead discussions confidently and guide decision-making to strengthen client relationships.

opportunities.title: Re-engage with Improved Compensation Insights
opportunities.description: The lack of detailed compensation information and slow responses contributed to losing a preferred candidate, signaling a need to re-engage with improved processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Trying to get out of them what current comp was, was impossible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Gather full, detailed compensation information early in the process to prevent delays and improve client satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Enhance Report Timing and Preparation
opportunities.description: Reports were often shared shortly before calls, limiting preparation time for stakeholders, indicating a need for improvement in report timing.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The reports would often land an hour or two before the call... you have no hope in hell of getting to it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure reports and candidate materials are shared with sufficient lead time for stakeholders to review.

opportunities.title: Proactive Brief Refinement
opportunities.description: Jeanette felt profile alignment issues persisted without proactive correction, suggesting a need for improvement in brief refinement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They didn't seem to instinctively pick up that it wasn't quite right... they just kept pushing forward.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Raise any concerns about candidate fit or search direction proactively to ensure alignment with client expectations.

opportunities.title: Support in Succession Planning
opportunities.description: Greg Aarssen expressed a need for Korn Ferry to assist in improving succession planning and reducing blind spots within the organization.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think we need to have someone that is doing some of these... evaluations and analysis to make sure that we don't have blind spots.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should offer services focused on succession planning and blind spot analysis to TriSummit Utilities.

opportunities.title: Broaden Services to Include Board-Level Support
opportunities.description: There is potential for Korn Ferry to expand its services to include more rigorous succession assessment and board-level support.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg sees clear scope for more rigorous succession assessment and board-level support, and is already exploring this with Korn Ferry.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should propose a comprehensive plan for board-level support and succession assessment to TriSummit Utilities.

opportunities.title: Re-engage for Future Executive Searches
opportunities.description: Greg Aarssen expressed strong intent to reuse Korn Ferry for future executive searches, indicating a need to maintain engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Would I ever use these people again? I can't imagine not using them again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should maintain regular communication with Greg Aarssen to stay informed about future executive search needs.

opportunities.title: Increase Visibility in the Market
opportunities.description: Greg suggested that Korn Ferry could strengthen its visibility, which could enhance its market presence and client engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: He struggled to identify any issues with the work itself, suggesting only that Korn Ferry could potentially strengthen its visibility.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should implement a marketing strategy to increase its visibility in the executive search market.

opportunities.title: Need for concise assessment summaries
opportunities.description: The CEO expressed a desire for more concise, 'black and white' summaries in assessment reports, particularly on specific behaviors like handling conflict and restructuring.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The documents are long and very nuanced, and you might sometimes maybe have wished them to be a little bit more black and white.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer a short, clearly framed summary alongside detailed reports, highlighting key behavioral flags in more 'black and white' terms.

opportunities.title: Enhance practical client experience
opportunities.description: The CEO mentioned a minor irritation with parking logistics when visiting Korn Ferry's office, suggesting that practical details can affect the overall experience.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'd wish they had parking spaces in their own office, because you always have to go to another building... it's a bit annoying.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Where possible, make the in-person experience as smooth as the advisory work by addressing logistical details like parking.

opportunities.title: Leverage strong individual relationships
opportunities.description: The CEO's decision to work with Korn Ferry was heavily influenced by trust in specific individuals, indicating an opportunity to deepen relationships with key decision-makers.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I knew the boss, I knew the consultant that I wanted to work with, because I have a deep trust in [Danny]'s... human touch.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to maintain high-touch, trusted relationships with key CEOs, investors, and local leaders.

opportunities.title: Maintain speed and efficiency in processes
opportunities.description: The CEO valued the fast candidate generation and efficient interview phase, suggesting that maintaining this pace is crucial for future engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Everything went very fast, the finding of the candidates in both role. I also was impressed that it was fast...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Preserve the fast sourcing, efficient interview set-up, and ongoing communication that were highlighted as strengths.

opportunities.title: Reintroduce Dual-Consultant Model
opportunities.description: The dual-consultant model was a unique differentiator that added value through diverse perspectives. Its removal has reduced the perceived quality of consultation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: That was the differentiating factor... two different individuals from two different cultures.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore the feasibility of reinstating the dual-consultant model, especially in high-value markets or key accounts.

opportunities.title: Clarify Assessment Tool Value
opportunities.description: Assessment tools were provided but not utilized as they did not support the client's decision-making process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We got that for free in some instances, but honestly, I didn't use it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide clear guidance on when and how assessment tools can add value to the search process.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Consultation Quality
opportunities.description: The removal of the dual-consultant model has led to a perceived reduction in consultation quality.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We got different quality of the consultations because obviously the second person was adding a certain perspective and value.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Consider ways to enhance consultation quality, possibly by incorporating diverse perspectives or expertise.

opportunities.title: Separate Positioning for Broader Consulting Services
opportunities.description: Jan does not assume Korn Ferry's search capabilities translate to transformation or development work, indicating a need for distinct positioning.
opportunities.supportingQuote: No, because that's a different skill set... I would again pitch and see who's best.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure broader consulting services are introduced by the right experts and positioned separately from search capabilities.

opportunities.title: Broader Candidate Sourcing for High-Profile Roles
opportunities.description: Gary expressed a need for Korn Ferry to explore a wider range of potential candidates, including those from outside traditional sector boundaries, for high-profile roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I had urged them to look broad... like college presidents... and they didn't really do that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should expand their candidate sourcing strategies to include diverse and non-traditional backgrounds for high-profile roles.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate Commitment Validation
opportunities.description: There is a need to validate candidate readiness and commitment earlier in the process to avoid late-stage withdrawals.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry should have vetted this ahead of time... before we went through this final testing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement more rigorous early-stage assessments of candidate commitment, particularly regarding relocation and other practical considerations.

opportunities.title: Maintain Continuity and Ownership
opportunities.description: Gary noted a drop in engagement and ownership following the temporary absence of the lead partner, indicating a need for consistent leadership throughout the engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It just felt a little bit... an ownership thing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure clear ownership and consistent client touchpoints are maintained throughout the engagement, even when team changes occur.

opportunities.title: Explore Adjacent Leadership Capabilities
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to consider a wider range of leadership profiles that may bring transferable skills and value to high-profile roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Support broader consideration of senior leadership profiles.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Encourage exploration of candidates with adjacent or transferable leadership capabilities for high-profile roles.

opportunities.title: Need for Enhanced Partnership Engagement
opportunities.description: Julie expressed a need for more partnership-led engagement, particularly in recognizing her role and authority within the client organization.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It definitely feels like a diminishment of my role.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should ensure consistent recognition of the primary client contact's role and foster a collaborative engagement style.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship Through Collaborative Fee Discussions
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to expand the relationship by adopting a more flexible and partnership-oriented approach to fee discussions.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Being treated like that makes me not want to work with them again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should apply discretion in fee-related discussions to align with expectations of a long-term relationship.

opportunities.title: Re-engage by Addressing Operational Burdens
opportunities.description: Julie felt that Korn Ferry relied too heavily on internal resources for logistics, which could be a point of re-engagement by addressing this concern.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They rely on us very heavily for everything logistical...It feels like they kind of expect us to do their logistics.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should rebalance operational responsibilities to ensure internal teams are not carrying disproportionate effort.

opportunities.title: Improve Process Efficiency and Continuity
opportunities.description: Repeated requests for previously shared materials indicate a need for improved process management and continuity.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They were like, 'Oh, we don't have that template. Can you send it again?'
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should strengthen continuity in process management by ensuring materials, templates, and agreed formats are retained and reused.

opportunities.title: Need for Broader Consulting Support
opportunities.description: Tim noted that broader consulting support may be needed in the future as the organization scales.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think we'd need a bit more scale before we went to somebody of Korn Ferry size to do other work like that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Monitor Logistics UK's growth and re-engage when they reach a scale that requires broader consulting services.

opportunities.title: Expand Use of Psychometric Tools
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to expand the use of Korn Ferry's psychometric tools beyond hiring into development planning.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We use their psychometric tools for assessment, and they were very, very good. It will be used for a development plan, yeah, absolutely.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer additional services or workshops on integrating psychometric assessments into development plans.

opportunities.title: Re-engage on Leadership Capability Development
opportunities.description: Tim highlighted the growing priority of senior leadership capability, particularly outward-facing credibility, following the CEO appointment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The most important thing for us is that our outward facing activities are done by really high-quality people.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Propose a leadership development program focused on enhancing outward-facing credibility for senior leaders.

opportunities.title: Support for Upcoming Organizational Transformation
opportunities.description: Claire anticipates a broader organizational transformation in the coming year, which may require additional support from Korn Ferry.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It will be a culture change… but we all don’t know what it is.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively engage with Claire to discuss potential support Korn Ferry can provide during the anticipated transformation.

opportunities.title: Iterative Program Design for Enhanced Value
opportunities.description: The ability to refine the program cohort by cohort is seen as a differentiator, suggesting an opportunity to expand this iterative approach.
opportunities.supportingQuote: After every cohort, we can tweak a little bit to make every cohort a better program.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to leverage and promote the iterative design process to enhance program value and explore additional areas for refinement.

opportunities.title: Increase Awareness of Broader Capabilities
opportunities.description: Alexander expressed limited awareness of Korn Ferry's broader offerings beyond executive search, indicating a potential need for additional services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm not aware of what other products or services they offer.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a strategy to increase awareness of Korn Ferry's full range of services among existing clients like Alexander.

opportunities.title: Leverage Pay Benchmarking and Market Insight
opportunities.description: Alexander values Korn Ferry's compensation insights for internal decision-making, suggesting an opportunity to expand this service.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We're asking Korn Ferry for market data on pay... It's helpful for us... so that the hiring leader can go back to their senior leader and present that and make a case.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer expanded pay benchmarking and market insight services to deepen the relationship with clients.

opportunities.title: Promote Use of Assessment Tools
opportunities.description: Assessment tools were not used in recent searches due to hiring leader preferences, indicating a need to re-engage clients on the benefits of these tools.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They're not necessarily looking at any assessment tools... They like to just have a conversation with the particular candidate.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Re-engage with clients to demonstrate the value and benefits of using Korn Ferry's assessment tools in the hiring process.

opportunities.title: Enhance Human-Led Search with AI
opportunities.description: While supportive of AI, Alexander emphasizes the importance of human interaction and judgement in the search process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It’s one thing to use AI to identify potential candidates, but what I’m looking for is the search firm’s expertise in relationship.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to enhance the human-led search process by integrating AI tools while maintaining a strong focus on personal relationships and expert judgement.

opportunities.title: Need for Early Collaborative Re-alignment
opportunities.description: When a new internal lead steps in mid-stream, there is value in consciously rebuilding the relationship and re-contracting ways of working.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We could have gone aside a bit more together as colleagues. We could have shaped it a bit better, a bit earlier between us, just a little bit more collaborative.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a structured process for re-alignment when client-side stakeholders change during an engagement.

opportunities.title: Continued Willingness to Work with Korn Ferry
opportunities.description: Despite challenges, Luke indicated a willingness to work with Korn Ferry again, with careful consideration of context.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would, I would do. I would be very specific about circumstance and everything and all of that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage with Luke to discuss potential future projects and clarify the circumstances under which collaboration would be most effective.

opportunities.title: Create Space for 'Reset' Conversation
opportunities.description: A 'reset' conversation when client-side ownership changes mid-engagement can help establish working preferences and decision dynamics.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Recognize that there's been a cut and that the new person is different, or that, you know, you've got a blank slate.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce a formal 'reset' meeting protocol to re-establish rapport and collaboration when new stakeholders are introduced.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Early Calibration on Scope
opportunities.description: Early calibration on scope is crucial where confidentiality and precision create natural constraints.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There had been a decision to be very precise about the type of person that the business wanted to appoint, and I think that made it more challenging.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish early checkpoints in the process to confirm whether the search has sufficient breadth to sustain momentum.

opportunities.title: Need for Implementation Expertise
opportunities.description: Lesley emphasized the need for expertise to guide and build capability during implementation, highlighting a future need for support in executing strategies effectively.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I need expertise to show people what different looks like, and then to lead them through, helping change that and building capability as you go.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should offer specialized implementation support services to guide and build capability within the client's organization.

opportunities.title: Interest in Broader Korn Ferry Capabilities
opportunities.description: Lesley expressed an increased openness to considering Korn Ferry for future work, particularly in more commercial aspects beyond the initial HR model.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've now got a greater appreciation of the breadth that Korn Ferry can bring to us... particularly the much more commercial aspects of it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively present a broader range of services and capabilities to Lesley to explore potential areas for future collaboration.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Implementation Ownership
opportunities.description: Lesley highlighted the need for stronger internal ownership of implementation, suggesting a need for re-engagement to ensure alignment and follow-through.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I needed the people I would look to to implement, to actually own it. And I'm not too sure that that happened in the way that I wanted.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should work closely with client-side leaders to ensure they are equipped and motivated to own and champion the implementation process.

opportunities.title: Earlier Escalation of Misalignment
opportunities.description: Lesley would have appreciated more proactive escalation when alignment or momentum began to slip, indicating a need for improvement in communication.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Escalate the minute you feel that... there's not enough alignment internally.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should establish a protocol for early escalation of misalignment issues to enable timely intervention and recalibration.

opportunities.title: Anticipate Future Engineering Discipline Needs
opportunities.description: Karina highlighted a decline in candidate availability in certain engineering disciplines, such as electrical engineering, indicating a potential future need for targeted recruitment strategies.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We're seeing a decline in availability in certain engineering disciplines like electrical engineering... and we see that across the board.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop targeted recruitment strategies for engineering disciplines with declining candidate availability to ensure a robust pipeline.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with Structured Updates
opportunities.description: Karina appreciated the structured communication and regular updates, suggesting an opportunity to further deepen the relationship by evolving content based on stakeholder needs.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg scheduled by monthly calls with the team... to give us updates, to share... additional context on the candidates... and help answer any questions.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue and enhance the structured communication rhythm with role-specific updates to maintain confidence and alignment.

opportunities.title: Maintain Dialogue on Market Constraints
opportunities.description: Karina noted market constraints affecting candidate availability, suggesting the need for ongoing dialogue to manage expectations and explore potential adjustments.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We're all kind of seeing a decline in availability in certain engineering disciplines like electrical engineering.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Keep an explicit dialogue open with stakeholders on potential adjustments to search strategies in response to market constraints.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Early Candidate Interest Validation
opportunities.description: Karina valued the early screening of candidate interest and fit, indicating that reinforcing this practice could further improve service delivery.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They were already... testing interest and availability up front.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue reinforcing early candidate interest and location alignment to protect stakeholder time and sustain process momentum.
